name: Kingdom of Law
description:
Intro:

You have just became the king after a bloody war. You must choose the vassals within your court before the citizens become restless!

Mechanics:

Order: Starts at 100, you lose order the longer you have an incomplete court of vassals. Some vassals grant a little extra order on being accepted into your court.

Reach 0 Order and your kingdom falls into ruin!

Law: Reach 100 Law to win! Vassals provide an amount of Law on being accepted.

Corruption: Vassals with Corruption will give you money, but money doesn't bring your citizens Law! Too much of a good thing is a bad thing.

Controls:

Mouse Left Click - Select buttons

A - Accept Vassal

D - Decline Vassal
